snippet: The Kings took a stranglehold 3-0 lead over the Devils, rolling to the brink of their first championship in club history with swarming, nearly flawless defense.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-0, to take 3-0 game lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
lead_paragraph: The Kings took a stranglehold 3-0 lead over the Devils, rolling to the brink of their first championship in club history with swarming, nearly flawless defense.

headline.seo: As Kings Chase a Sweep, the Devils Try to Survive
headline.main: As the Kings Chase a Sweep, the Devils Try to Survive
headline.print_headline: As Kings Chase a Sweep, The Devils Try to Survive
headline.content_kicker: Stanley Cup Finals | Game 3: Kings 4, Devils 0
